title: VS Code Server
textContent:
VS Code Server 
                VS Code Server is a service you can run on a remote development
                    machine, like your desktop PC or a virtual machine (VM). It allows you to securely connect to that
                    remote machine from anywhere through a vscode.dev URL, without the requirement of SSH.
                To Install VS Code Server, ⚠️ run the command below in the LXC console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/code-server.sh)"
                VS Code Server Interface: IP:8680
outerHTML:
VS Code Server

VS Code Server is a service you can run on a remote development machine, like your desktop PC or a virtual machine (VM). It allows you to securely connect to that remote machine from anywhere through a vscode.dev URL, without the requirement of SSH.

To Install VS Code Server, ⚠️ run the command below in the LXC console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/code-server.sh)"

VS Code Server Interface: IP:8680
